title: Vuser Protocol Manifest
description: Defines the permitted AI actions, parameters, and interaction models for a publisher's website.

vuserManifestVersion.description: The version of the Vuser manifest specification this file adheres to.

name.description: The legal name of the publisher.

url.description: The root domain this manifest applies to.

actions.description: An array of permitted actions the AI agent can perform.

name.description: A programmatic, unique name for the action (e.g., 'bookTicket', 'search').

description.description: A human-readable description of what this action does.

type.description: The type of interaction this action primarily represents.

parameters.description: An array of data parameters this action accepts.

interaction.description: Defines the specific DOM selectors and events for this action.

parameter.description: Defines a single input parameter for an action.

name.description: The programmatic name of the parameter.

required.description: Whether this parameter is mandatory for the action.

interaction.description: The mapping of action parameters to DOM elements. The required fields depend on the parent action's 'type'.

formSelector.description: Required for 'FORM_SUBMISSION'. The CSS selector for the <form> element.

fieldMappings.description: Required for 'FORM_SUBMISSION'. Maps parameter names to their input selectors.

additionalProperties.description: A CSS selector for the input/select/textarea element.

submitSelector.description: Optional for 'FORM_SUBMISSION'. Selector for the submit button. If absent, assumes a standard form.submit().

selector.description: Required for 'CLICK' or 'TEXT_INPUT'. The CSS selector for the target element.

parameterName.description: Required for 'TEXT_INPUT'. The name of the *single* parameter whose value will be entered.
